PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTypeEarthFailureDevice
PropertySetDef.Definition: Definition from IAI: An earth failure device acts to protect people and equipment from the effects of current leakage.

PropertyDef.Name: EarthFailureDeviceType
Sensitivity
PropertyDef.Definition: Current leakage to an unwanted leading path during normal operation (IEC 151-14-49)
